summary: IT professional with extensive experience in training, business analysis, and enterprise system implementations across Virginia state agencies. Expertise in requirements gathering, change management, data warehouse training, and stakeholder engagement; proven ability to lead large-scale projects, develop training curricula, and drive process improvements and cost savings.

experience.title: Sales
experience.description: Led efforts to implement the Paperless Office across 33 local Virginia agencies; trained users; managed enterprise systems; captured business rules and policies; drove change management and successful solutions; improved efficiency in agency operations.

experience.title: Training Consultant/Business Analyst
experience.description: Developed DW refresher course and new user curriculum; created updated DW training manuals; liaised between users, administrators, developers and program managers; identified improvements to VDSS DW training techniques; created updated training resources (Articulate); trained state and local administrators on Data Warehouse.

experience.title: Training Consultant/Business Analyst
experience.description: Identified and documented functional requirements for the implementation of an enterprise system (HR, E-Finance, E-Pharmacy, Crisis, Case Management and Reporting); developed user readiness surveys, business process models, vendor selection guidance, and a training implementation plan; supported RFP development; acted as liaison between software vendors and stakeholders.

experience.title: Training Consultant/Business Analyst
experience.description: Project Lead Trainer for ChildWins; delivered training for SPIDeR and Data Warehouse statewide; increased usage and efficiency; led 'Train the Trainer' sessions and 'Super User' groups; developed DW curricula and user manuals; introduced curriculum development tools (Articulate) and supported SIT/UAT testing; represented VDSS on local committees; oversaw training resources and stakeholder communications.

experience.title: Training Director/Business Consultant
experience.description: Lead business and workflow consultant; Director of Training for 8 traveling trainers; managed day-to-day training needs of 33 local DSS agencies and 8 EZ-Filer trainers; developed curricula for multiple learning environments; authored user manuals; oversaw hardware installations and training logistics; supported Medicaid Smart Card project and other program policies; 100% travel.
